original: The COVID-19 pandemic has significantly impacted the world in terms of public health, economy, and various societal aspects. Among the sectors most affected by the pandemic is nursing, as highlighted in the article "COVID-19: Impact on Nurses and Nursing" by Fauteux. This article contributes to understanding the changes in nursing practices and the challenges faced by nurses during this unpreceden
